title: 81/133/EEC: Commission Decision of 18 February 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Carl Zeiss-Interpretoskop B' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 18 February 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as "Carl Zeiss-Interpretoskop B" may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties (81/133/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Carl Zeiss-Interpretoskop B", which is the subject of an application by the United Kingdom Government of 21 August 1980, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 February 1981.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 184, 15.7.1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 134, 31.5.1979, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 318, 13.12.1979, p. 32.
